anya-e0105n34:1_0: Paramatthajotikaṁ nāma khuddakapāṭhassa ceva suttanipātassa ca aṭṭhakathaṁ kenacipi anāyācito attano icchāvaseneva akāsi.
anya-e0105n34:7_0: Tatheva ca ṭhitaṁ yasmā, navaṅgaṁ satthusāsanaṁ.
anya-e0105n34:12_0: Bahū pana vicakkhaṇā imā ārambhagāthāyo vicinitvā ‘‘netaṁ ācariyabuddhaghosattherassa viya vacanaṁ hotī’’ti vadanti. Ayañca nesaṁ vicinanākāro,
anya-e0105n34:12_1: ācariyabuddhaghoso hi yaṁ kañci ganthaṁ sīlādiguṇasampannena aññena āyācitova karoti,
anya-e0105n34:12_3: Punapi ācariyo ‘‘porāṇasīhaḷaṭṭhakathaṁ bhāsāparivattanavasena karissāmī’’ti ca ‘‘mahāvihāravāsīnaṁ vācanāmaggaṁ nissāya karissāmī’’ti ca evaṁ paṭiññaṁ katvāva karoti,
anya-e0105n34:12_5: Punapi ācariyo atigambhīratthānaṁ catunnañcāgamānaṁ abhidhammassa ca saṁvaṇṇanārambhepi dukkarabhāvaṁ na katheti,
anya-e0105n34:12_6: idha pana ‘‘sāsanaṁ abodhantena mādisenā’’ti attanā sāsanassa abuddhabhāvaṁ pakāsetvā ‘‘atidukkarā’’ti ca katheti.
anya-e0105n34:12_7: Tasmā ‘‘netaṁ ācariyabuddhaghosassa viya vacana’’nti vadanti. Taṁ yuttaṁ viya dissati,
anya-e0105n34:12_8: ācariyo hi attano ganthanigamanesu ‘‘tipiṭakapariyattippabhede sāṭṭhakathe satthusāsane appaṭihatañāṇappabhāvenā’’ti attano ñāṇappabhāvaṁ pakāsesi,
anya-e0105n34:12_9: so ‘‘sāsanaṁ abodhantena mādisena atidukkarā’’ti īdisaṁ vacanaṁ na katheyyayevāti.
